verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Speak<WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and take<WH3947> of every one of them a rod<WH4294> <WH4294> according to the house<WH1004> of their fathers<WH1>, of all their princes<WH5387> according to the house<WH1004> of their fathers<WH1> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> rods<WH4294>: write<WH3789> thou every man's<WH376> name<WH8034> upon his rod<WH4294>.
And thou shalt write<WH3789> Aaron's<WH175> name<WH8034> upon the rod<WH4294> of Levi<WH3878>: for one<WH259> rod<WH4294> shall be for the head<WH7218> of the house<WH1004> of their fathers<WH1>.
And thou shalt lay them up<WH3240> in the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> before<WH6440> the testimony<WH5715>, where I will meet<WH3259> with you.

And it shall come to pass, that the man's<WH376> rod<WH4294>, whom I shall choose<WH977>, shall blossom<WH6524>: and I will make to cease<WH7918> from me the murmurings<WH8519> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, whereby they murmur<WH3885> against you.

And Moses<WH4872> spake<WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and every one of their princes<WH5387> gave<WH5414> him a rod<WH4294> <WH4294> apiece, for each prince<WH5387> <WH5387> one<WH259> <WH259>, according to their fathers'<WH1> houses<WH1004>, even twelve<WH6240> <WH8147> rods<WH4294>: and the rod<WH4294> of Aaron<WH175> was among<WH8432> their rods<WH4294>. a rod: Heb. a rod for one prince, a rod for one prince
And Moses<WH4872> laid up<WH3240> the rods<WH4294> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> in the tabernacle<WH168> of witness<WH5715>.

And it came to pass, that on the morrow<WH4283> Moses<WH4872> went<WH935> into the tabernacle<WH168> of witness<WH5715>; and, behold, the rod<WH4294> of Aaron<WH175> for the house<WH1004> of Levi<WH3878> was budded<WH6524>, and brought forth<WH3318> buds<WH6525>, and bloomed<WH6692> blossoms<WH6731>, and yielded<WH1580> almonds<WH8247>.

And Moses<WH4872> brought out<WH3318> all the rods<WH4294> from before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> unto all the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>: and they looked<WH7200>, and took<WH3947> every man<WH376> his rod<WH4294>.

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Bring<WH7725> Aaron's<WH175> rod<WH4294> again<WH7725> before<WH6440> the testimony<WH5715>, to be kept<WH4931> for a token<WH226> against the rebels<WH4805> <WH1121>; and thou shalt quite take away<WH3615> their murmurings<WH8519> from me, that they die<WH4191> not. rebels: Heb. children of rebellion
And Moses<WH4872> did<WH6213> so: as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> him, so did<WH6213> he.
And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> spake<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>, Behold, we die<WH1478>, we perish<WH6>, we all perish<WH6>.
Whosoever cometh any thing near<WH7131> unto the tabernacle<WH4908> of the LORD<WH3068> shall die<WH4191>: shall we be consumed<WH8552> with dying<WH1478>?
